pages.text: $(1)Aha! I've isolated that secret Power of the Breezes. I think I'll call it $(item)Flow$(1), after the design motif that the Trial of Wind uses.

$(1)I've already determined that Wind Charges can be replicated from this Power, using $(thing)Snow$(1) as the base. $(p)It doesn't seem like a net positive of Flow, however it makes me wonder if it would bind to $(thing)Ice$(0).
$(1)And indeed, bind to $(item)Packed Ice$(1) it does! The result is a chunk that doesn't comfortably sit as a block. Instead, it has the miraculous ability to propel the user through the air!
